jobs.title: Elementary Teacher K-5 Openings for the 25-26 school year (Full and Part Time)
jobs.status: Full Time and Part Time (please indicate on application if you are ONLY interested in Part Time positions)The salary for this position is assigned to the TT Salary Schedule.To view the salary schedule, please select the following linkTT Salary Schedule.WCSD will recognize no more than thirteen full time, complete years of previous teaching experience when placing on the TT Salary Schedule. To estimate possible step placement on the TT Salary Schedule, select following linkTT Step Placement Calculator.Minimum Requirements:Active Utah Early ChildhoodorElementary Teaching License. jobs.title: Sub Bus Driver Trainee
jobs.status: On-Call/As NeededMinimum QualificationsMinimum age of 21 years.Have no more than 100 points recorded on past driving record.  No more than two at-fault accidents, two citations, or a combination of one at-fault accident and one citation, in a 24 month period.Hold and maintain a Utah Commercial Drivers License.  Driver Training will be provided if candidate needs to obtain the Utah Commercial Drivers License.The salary for this position is assigned to the BD Salary ScheduleAFTER completion of training.To view the salary schedule, please select the following linkBD Salary Schedule.APPLICANTS ARE REQUIRED TO ATTACH/UPLOAD A COPY OF THEIR CURRENT DRIVING RECORD WITH THE APPLICATIONA copy of the driving record can be obtained from the Department of Motor Vehicles.Attachment(s):Bus Driver & Sub Bus Driver.pdfEmail To A FriendPrint Version

jobs.title: Head Girls Basketball Coach (no teaching assignment)
jobs.description: This Head Girls Basketball Coaching assignment is for the 2025-2026 school year with no expectation of a teaching assignment.WCSD coaches are required to meet all UHSAA certification requirementspriorto starting assignment and are required to maintain certifications during duration of employment.If any additional questions, applicants can contact the Athletic Director, Dustin Drake, at Dustin.drake@washk12.org.A stipend will be provided for this assignment.

jobs.title: Head Boys Wrestling Coach (no teaching assignment)
jobs.description: This Head Boys Wrestling Coaching assignment is for the 2025-2026 school year with no expectation of a teaching assignment.WCSD coaches are required to meet all UHSAA certification requirementspriorto starting assignment and are required to maintain certifications during duration of employment.If any additional questions, applicants can contact the Athletic Director, Mike Bair, at mike.bair@washk12.org.A stipend will be provided for this assignment.

jobs.title: Head Drill Coach (no teaching assignment)
jobs.description: This Head Drill coaching assignment is for the 2025-2026 school year with no expectation of a teaching assignment.WCSD coaches are required to meet all UHSAA certification requirementspriorto starting assignment and are required to maintain certifications during duration of employment.If any additional questions, applicants can contact the Athletic Director, Nate Bowler at nathan.bowler@washk12.org.A stipend will be provided for this assignment.
